oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the same dialect are also some names of animals, explaining the Bushman pictures copied by Mr Schunke. (B XXVII. 2619-2621.) |xam names of animals seen at the South African Museum by ||kabbo and |a!kunta, and also by =kasin, some also in Koranna. Names of animals, mainly identified at the Museum (B II. 358 and 359, 366-368, XXV. 2341-2344, 2349 and 2350)...and lastly in the Katkop dialect by #kasin (B XXV. 2381-2384, or 2424-2428).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: names of animals given by Klaas Katkop (=kasin), ||kabbo (Jantje) and |a!kunta (Stoffel)
